name: @worker-tools/deno-kv-storage
description: An implementation of the StorageArea interface for Deno with an extensible system for supporting various database backends

scripts.prepack: npm run clean && npm run build
scripts.build: npm run build:mod && npm run build:sqlite
scripts.build:mod: shx mkdir -p dist && deno bundle mod.ts > dist/index.js
scripts.build:sqlite: shx mkdir -p dist && deno bundle sqlite.ts > dist/sqlite.js

author: Florian Klampfer <mail@qwtel.com> (https://qwtel.com/)
